channel.title: Error connecting to server (wtf!)
channel.description: ok so i have a source & client (syscape) and i have done everything, i portfowarded, dwloaded no-ip and added the host, changed the ip in the GUI to my server ip(no no-ip one) and i went to his house, dwloaded the client and when i click login it takes like 1 min b4 it says error connecting to server. please help if you can (i did compile everything too)
